Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne)
Please read the FAQ section & other posts on your topic before posting in General Q&A.
We expect everyone to have read the FAQ before posting!
The goal in maintaining this Archive is to have a concise Monster Rancher guide.
Off-topic posts & those answerable with "Read the Archive" are deleted within 48 hours.
Monster Rancher 2 was released as Monster Rancher in Europe, Australia, NZ, etc.
If your game has Mocchi on the cover & PAL under the Playstation logo,
you are in the wrong place:
Please use the Monster Rancher 2 Archive.
